name: Laser Puzzle in VR
description:
Mod and laconic interior of a space base, relaxing soundtrack and nice brainteaser.

You should solve it to enjoy shining figure and to get the reward – next brain-twister. Behind the apparently simplistic gameplay (you need to place the limited number of the elements properly on a field or several fields only) there are complicated and creative decisions.

  • Challenge your brain starting from compact puzzle to gigantic brainstorm on 2 walls:
    144 diversified levels of different complexity and with various approaches to solve them
  • Try game mode “Competition” and find yourself on leaderboard:
    11 levels with multiple ways to solve each of them
